items.content_html: This is a lightweight and versatile template to kickstart your React projects. Whether you're a beginner looking to learn React or an experienced developer starting a new project, this template provides a solid foundation with essential tools and configurations.
items.title: Brownei/reactwithtailwind-template: This is a lightweight and versatile template to kickstart your React projects. Whether you're a beginner looking to learn React or an experienced developer starting a new project, this template provides a solid foundation with essential tools and configurations.

items.content_html: This is a simple, lightweight, and flexible routing library for React applications. It provides a set of components and hooks to handle routing in your application, including support for dynamic routes with path parameters.
items.title: pedrovs3/react-router: This is a simple, lightweight, and flexible routing library for React applications. It provides a set of components and hooks to handle routing in your application, including support for dynamic routes with path parameters.
